Song.title: Save A Place For me
Song.copyright: Â© 2006 Word Music, LLC | Songs For Lulu | Wyzell Music | Simplex Songs (a div. of Word Music Group, Inc.) | (Admin. by Word Music Group, Inc.) | (Admin. by Simpleville Music, Inc.) | Matthew West | Sam Mizell

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Don't be [G]mad if I cr[D]y It just h[Am7]urts so bad somet[C]imes 'Cause everyd[G]ay it's sinking i[D]n And I h[Am7]ave to say goodbye all over ag[C]ain
Bridge 1: You know I [D]bet it feels good To have the w[Em7]eight of this world off Your sh[C]oulders now Now I'm dr[D]eaming of the day When I'm [Em7]finally there with Y[C]ou
Chorus: [G] Save a place for me [D] Save a place for me [Am7] I'll be there soon [C] I'll be there soon [G] [G] Save a place for me [D] Save some grace for me [Am7] I'll be there soon [C] I'll be th[C/D]ere soon [G - D - Am7 - C]
{new_page} Verse 2: I have [G]asked the question wh[D]y But I g[Am7]uess the answer's for another t[C]ime So instead I'll pr[G]ay with every t[D]ear And be th[Am7]ankful for the time I had [C]You here
Chorus: [G] Save a place for me [D] Save a place for me [Am7] I'll be there soon [C] I'll be there soon [G] [G] Save a place for me [D] Save some grace for me [Am7] I'll be there soon [C] [C] I'll be there
Bridge 2: [D] I wanna live my l[Em7]ife just like Y[C]ou did [D] And make the most of my t[Em7]ime just like Y[C]ou did And I wanna m[D]ake my home [Em7]up in the sky [C]Just like You did oh [C]But until I get there [C]Until I get there [(to Chorus)]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 dont be mad if i cry it just hurts so bad sometimes cause everyday its sinking in and i have to say goodbye all over again bridge 1 you know i bet it feels good to have the weight of this world off your shoulders now now im dreaming of the day when im finally there with you chorus save a place for me save a place for me ill be there soon ill be there soon save a place for me save some grace for me ill be there soon ill be there soon verse 2 i have asked the question why but i guess the answers for another time so instead ill pray with every tear and be thankful for the time i had you here chorus save a place for me save a place for me ill be there soon ill be there soon save a place for me save some grace for me ill be there soon ill be there bridge 2 i wanna live my life just like you did and make the most of my time just like you did and i wanna make my home up in the sky just like you did oh but until i get there until i get there
